content.rendered:
Apply for a Mariner Personal Loan from R10 000 up to R1 000 000, with rates from as low as 4.0%*

-Apply for your loan over a term of anywhere between 2 and 6 years.

-A guaranteed fixed interest rate means your monthly repayment will never change.

-Ensure your financial security for you and your family in the event that you are unable to pay your loan due to unforeseen circumstances.

Service benefits

Our personal loan is secured, tailored to suit your perosnal needs

  • Quick Disbursal
  • Fewer Documents
  • Minimal paperwork
  • No Collateral Needed
  • Pocket-friendly repayment
  • Attractive Interest Rates
  • Online EMI Calculator
  • Tax Benefits
